Features:

Superbly modeled with great details and photo textures

Authentic and detailed cab

Realistic sounds recorded from the real locomotive (optimized for EFX/OpenAL).

Functional display

SIFA safety system (changeable between basic and advance)

Moving Sun blinds

Desk, cab and instrument lights
